title: H.A.R.D. - Safende
description: H.A.R.D. streamlines the flow of relevant information between citizens, governments and critical service providers (hospitals, firemen, etc.) before, during and after a crisis or a disaster. This application allows you to check the location, contacts and updates of essential services; send alerts to authorities about issues you face; and receive recommendations on how to proceed.
